channel.title: The Glory Days - RS2006 Remake Private Server (Alpha 1.3)
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://glorydays.freeiz.com/img/title2/logo.png[/img]
home page: http://www.glorydays.freeiz.com/
desktop client: http://glorydays.freeiz.com/theglorydays.jar
W W W . T H E G L O R Y D A Y S . F R E E I Z . C O M [/CENTER]
[B][U]About The Server.[/U][/B]
Hello everyone whom is interested in the server so far! My name following this project is 'Febol' you can find me as an in-game player moderator, or the forum administration (community manager). This server is a personal project of Brian who is the owner of the entire project! I am here today to invite you to come check it out and see if you like it. The Glory Days, is currently in Alpha stage 1.3, and will have bugs and missing content in which we expect you to report to us when you have the time to. The economy is very young, and only about a week old. We usually have about 1-8 Players online, the most ever so far was 12. The community is completely new and exciting and we sincerely hope you can participate in the early stages of development as well.
One thing I personally love about the server is the exp rate at 2x the regular Runescape exp rates. Training your skills isn't going to be incredibly difficult and time consuming, however all players and staff have equal game play rights. All items that are obtainable in game are from players who make them or buy them from shops. Nobody even has their hands on rune armor yet! So get on over here and help the economy grow! <3 Thanks!
2014-11-08 01:18:02 This is a very simple development log for what I have added to the game. There is too much content in the game to add it all here. These are just the broadest and most important sections.
--SKILLS--
Combat -Attack -Strength -Defense -Ranged -Magic -Hitpoints
Prayer -Bury bones -Use Prayers -Correct Prayer effects
Herblore -Identify Herbs -Potion Making
Woodcutting -All trees cuttable
Firemaking -All logs burnable
Fletching -Make arrows -Make bows
Fishing -Small net fishing -Fly fishing -Bait fishing -Big net fishing -Harpoon fishing -Lobster fishing -Fishing Guild
Cooking -All types of obtainable food is cookable -Supports ranges -Supports fires -Cooking Guild
Runecrafting -All altars work -Talismans -Tiaras -Multiples
Mining -All ores are minable -Mining Guild
Smithing -Smelting ore into bars -Smith bars into armor and weapons -All types are available
Thieving -Steal from NPC's -Steal from Stalls
Slayer -Edgeville Master -Burthorpe Master -Slayer Shops
Crafting -Jewelry -Armor -Crafting Guild
Agility -In Development
Farming -In Development
--QUESTS--
The following quests are complete: -Cook's Assistant -Doric's Quest -Imp Catcher -Rune Mysteries -Sheep Shearer -Vampire Slayer -Witches Potion -Druidic Ritual -Fishing Contest -Lost City -Priest in Peril
--MINIGAMES--
The following mini games are complete: -Duel Arena -Barrows
--[B]OTHER CONTENT[/B]--
-Working shops -Trading system -Music/Sound system -Dialogue System -Friends/Private messaging -Local Highscores -Clue Scrolls
[COLOR="#EE82EE"][B]Media[/B][/COLOR]:
Log In:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LX4vkuA.png[/img]
Combat (Hilly Giants):
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CCwzSPl.png[/img]
Quest Start (11 Quests Total atm):
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GmmeJHC.png[/img]
Every skill listed under the green headers in the development log above indicate the working skills which we will add to the media later. All skills work perfectly and flawlessly. In addition to some lag that may occur depending on your internet connection. :p
Thanks! [IMG]http://glorydays.freeiz.com/img/title2/icon_crown_gold.gif[/img]Brian The Glory Days owner and game developer

item.title: The Glory Days - RS2006 Remake Private Server (Alpha 1.3)
item.dc:creator: @kaxman kaxman
item.description:
@kaxman wrote:

everyone talks about 2006 remakes, but if you are like me you’ve tried alot, but always prob. admin not there, players rude, content lacking, no updates, want donations every min, ect.

But, not at glory days, please try it out, excellent admin, active mods, close great community, mega content, and daily updates,

tryed to be a part of alot, but this game has hooked me and I am proud to be a part of it…

thanks for your consideration, that is all…

Read full topic
